abstract: Iran's Revolutionary Court denies request made by imprisoned Washington Post reporter Jason Rezaian to be released from jail for five days to celebrate Iranian New Year.
lead_paragraph: It was not clear why the judge refused Jason Rezaian a New Year furlough, sometimes granted to nonviolent inmates. His prosecution remains shrouded in mystery.

headline.main: Iran Judge Rejects Washington Post Reporter’s Petition for Prison Furlough
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Iran: Judge Denies Jailed Post Reporter’s Request

snippet: It was not clear why the judge refused Jason Rezaian a New Year furlough, sometimes granted to nonviolent inmates. His prosecution remains shrouded in mystery.
